name: Arushi Singh
profile: Full-Stack Developer | 3D Visualization & Frontend Engineering Innovative developer with hands-on experience building GitHub-like collaboration platforms for 3D models, integrating Rhino, OBJ, GLTF, and Forge Viewer for seamless visualization. Skilled in React, React Three Fiber, Material UI, and performance optimization, with a strong focus on creating reusable component libraries, measurement tools, and scalable architectures. Proven ability to deliver end-to-end modules under tight deadlines, driving measurable business impact — including a $150K revenue boost through rapid feature delivery.

experience.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Developed a GitHub-like 3D collaboration platform enabling version control, visualization, and interaction with 3D models, improving design review workflows.
Built a reusable component library using Material UI, with standardized height/width and styles, ensuring design consistency and faster feature delivery across the product.
Optimized rendering performance in React Three Fiber, reducing load times and improving user experience for complex 3D models.
Implemented measurement tools inside the 3D environment, allowing users to take accurate real-time dimensions directly on models.
Integrated multi-format 3D visualization pipelines, enabling seamless rendering of Rhino (.3dm), OBJ, and GLTF models for broad interoperability.
Worked with Autodesk Forge Viewer to extend model viewing capabilities, including loading, manipulation, and cross-platform visualization of BIM and CAD data.
Contributed to scalable frontend architecture, ensuring modularity, reusability, and maintainability in a fast-paced startup environment.
achievements: Delivered a full 3D collaboration module in under 15 days, accelerating go-market and directly contributing to $150K in company revenue.
Spearheaded end-to-end development of a critical product feature within two weeks, enabling the startup to secure $150K in profit through rapid client adoption

experience.title: Team Lead
experience.company: Centre for Computational Technologies Pvt. Ltd. (CCTech)
bullets: Created a dashboard with 10+ applications; handled customer meetings and presented frontend updates.
Developed core logic and problem-solving solutions for new feature implementation.
Built reusable code and libraries to accelerate future development.
Worked on Flair 3D project, visualizing 3D sensors on the frontend.

experience.title: Member of Technical Staff
experience.company: Centre for Computational Technologies Pvt. Ltd. (CCTech)
bullets: Implemented web apps and landing pages end-to-end with ReactJS, Python, and AWS.
Standardized UI with a responsive, user-friendly approach; validated all user inputs before submission.
Collaborated with designers to translate visuals into functional pages; assessed UX and UI feasibility.
achievements: Reduced bugs by 40% by eliminating prop drilling

projects.name: BIM Structure Viewer
projects.summary: A performant BIM viewer replacing legacy pipelines, with camera controls, sectioning, and material toggles.

projects.name: Flair 3D — Sensor Visualization
projects.summary: Visualizes 3D sensors and live states in a responsive WebGL interface for engineering teams.

projects.name: Satellite Orbit Visualizer
projects.summary: CesiumJS app to simulate satellite orbit, orientation and field of view with interactive controls.

projects.name: OBJ/GLTF Pipeline (Backend-driven)
projects.summary: Shifted column/beam generation to backend and streamed OBJ/GLTF to the client; cached parts in IndexedDB.

projects.name: Dimensioned Geometry Tool
projects.summary: Three.js utility to add dimension lines with arrows/labels around meshes; interactive resizing and offsets.
